entry.title: Hello MuzLin
entry.content: Hello MuzLin 23333 23333 233332333323333 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546body { background: #010101; overflow: hidden;}#star { position: absolute; left: 50%; top: 50%; width: 250px; height: 250px; transform: translate(-50%, -50%); border-radius: 50%; background: #DBE6E0; box-shadow: 0 0 50px rgba(219, 230, 224, 1);}#planet { position: absolute; left: 10px; top: 1px; width: 250px; height: 250px; border-radius: 50%; background: #010101; box-shadow: inset 0 0 50px rgba(150, 150, 150, 0.2); animation: eclipse 10s infinite linear; transform-origin: 50% 150%; transform: rotate(-60deg);}@keyframes eclipse { 0% { transform: rotate(-60deg); } 90% { transform: rotate(30deg); } 100% { transform: rotate(300deg); }}@keyframes color { }
